#include <vector>
#include <list>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <deque>
#include <stack>
#include <bitset>
#include <algorithm>
#include <functional>
#include <numeric>
#include <utility>
#include <sstream>
#include <iostream>
#include <iomanip>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <ctime>
#include <memory.h>
#include<cstring>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	int n,k;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n>>k;
		string s;
		cin >> s;
		int max=0,count=1,flag=0,ans=0;
		for(int i = 0;i<n-1;i++)
		{
			if(s[i] ==s[i+1])
			{
				count++;
			}
			else
				ans += (count/k)+(count%k!=0),count = 1;

				if(count==k)
					flag=1;
		}
		ans=ans+(count/k)+(count%k!=0);
		if(!flag)
			cout<<"-1"<<endl;
			else
				cout<<ans<<endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
